title: Comparison of Anole species Set Member 4

content.prompt: Based on Figure 1, which of the following would provide the strongest evidence to support a claim that A. valencienni and A. lineatopus are the two anole species most closely related to A. sagrei ?

choices.label: Comparing body structures, such as toe pads and limb length
Analyzing homologous DNA sequences among the species
Determining which species occupy a similar niche in Cuba
Observing which species have mating behaviors most similar to those of A. sagrei

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
